title: Coop vs AI
body: Sometime for quest or just when i have no time, i want to do a quick coop vs ai (faster and easier) and since 2 patchs i think one of the bot just afk, so yeah the thing is even easier and faster, but it's boring to just hit creeps and tower :/ if i want to do that i go in solo match ahah so i would like to know if anything gonna get fixed soon or whatever ? ^^

replies.body: It's the AFK protection not some newbie assistance.  They introduced a feature where if someone on your side of a Co-Op vs AI is totally inactive then the AI would compensate by shutting down Bot Player 2.  Unfortunately it's triggering all the time so you only get 5 v 4.

They don't know why it's doing that, but they'll look into it after they fix the ARAM dash bug.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/UlYv4mX5-aram-dash-bug?comment=00040001000000000000

Checking match history, Coop vs AI games were fine on 7/13, but had problems on 7/20 . Patch 8.14 was deployed on 7/18. That was the patch when they introduced the "play a bot game with a friend below level 15" mission. So they changed something in the Coop vs AI game mode and did not test it thoroughly. Hopefully, they did not do it intentionally to make it easier for the low level players. That mission is going on for another 3 weeks..... The problem is not with the AIs themselves, because custom AI games work fine. It's the Coop vs AI game mode that is messed up.
Which means preseason next year at this rate.
